similar.title: Observations about sexual and other routes of SARS-CoV-2 transmission and its prevention.
text: Observations about sexual and other routes of SARS-CoV-2 transmission and its prevention.
Sexual contact has been proposed as a route of transmission for the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which raises the question of alternate routes of transmission.
abstract: Sexual contact has been proposed as a route of transmission for the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which raises the question of alternate routes of transmission.

similar.title: [Transmission routes of 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV)].
text: Since the outbreak of COVID-19 in Wuhan, China, at the end of 2019, it has demonstrated China's ability to identify unknown pathogens. At present, reports showed that the main transmission routes are respiratory droplets and indirect contact, other vertical transmission routes have yet to be confirmed. This review discusses the possible transmission routes of 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), based on currently research, the main transmission routes are respiratory droplets and indirect contact, fecal-oral might bepossible, while aerosol, tear (conjunctival) and mother-to-fetus still have yet to be confirmed, providing a reference basis for 2019-nCoV prevention and control and public protection.
Zhonghua Yu Fang Yi Xue Za Zhi
abstract: Since the outbreak of COVID-19 in Wuhan, China, at the end of 2019, it has demonstrated China's ability to identify unknown pathogens. At present, reports showed that the main transmission routes are respiratory droplets and indirect contact, other vertical transmission routes have yet to be confirmed. This review discusses the possible transmission routes of 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), based on currently research, the main transmission routes are respiratory droplets and indirect contact, fecal-oral might bepossible, while aerosol, tear (conjunctival) and mother-to-fetus still have yet to be confirmed, providing a reference basis for 2019-nCoV prevention and control and public protection.
